data.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [But when] رَأَوْهُ [they (will) see it] زُلْفَةًۭ [approaching] سِيٓـَٔتْ [(will be) distressed] وُجُوهُ [(the) faces] ٱلَّذِينَ [(of) those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] وَقِيلَ [and it will be said] هَـٰذَا [This] ٱلَّذِى [(is) that which] كُنتُم [you used to] بِهِۦ [for it] تَدَّعُونَ [call]
data.transliteration: Falamma raawhu zulfatan see-atwujoohu allatheena kafaroo waqeela hatha allatheekuntum bihi taddaAAoon

data.textUthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] أَرَءَيْتُمْ [Have you seen] إِنْ [if] أَهْلَكَنِىَ [destroys me] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] وَمَن [and whoever] مَّعِىَ [(is) with me] أَوْ [or] رَحِمَنَا [has mercy upon us] فَمَن [then who] يُجِيرُ [(can) protect] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [the disbelievers] مِنْ [from] عَذَابٍ [a punishment] أَلِيمٍۢ [painful]
data.transliteration: Qul araaytum in ahlakaniya Allahuwaman maAAiya aw rahimana faman yujeeru alkafireenamin AAathabin aleem

data.textUthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] هُوَ [He] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [(is) the Most Gracious] ءَامَنَّا [we believe] بِهِۦ [in Him] وَعَلَيْهِ [and upon Him] تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ [we put (our) trust] فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ [So you will know] مَنْ [who] هُوَ [(is) it] فِى [(that is) in] ضَلَـٰلٍۢ [error] مُّبِينٍۢ [clear]
data.transliteration: Qul huwa arrahmanu amannabihi waAAalayhi tawakkalna fasataAAlamoona man huwa fee dalalinmubeen

data.textUthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] أَرَءَيْتُمْ [Have you seen] إِنْ [if] أَصْبَحَ [becomes] مَآؤُكُمْ [your water] غَوْرًۭا [sunken] فَمَن [then who] يَأْتِيكُم [could bring you] بِمَآءٍۢ [water] مَّعِينٍۭ [flowing]
data.transliteration: Qul araaytum in asbaha maokumghawran faman ya/teekum bima-in maAAeen

data.wordByWord: نٓ ۚ [Nun] وَٱلْقَلَمِ [By the pen] وَمَا [and what] يَسْطُرُونَ [they write]
مَآ [Not] أَنتَ [you (are)] بِنِعْمَةِ [by (the) Grace] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] بِمَجْنُونٍۢ [a madman]
وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لَكَ [for you] لَأَجْرًا [surely (is) a reward] غَيْرَ [without] مَمْنُونٍۢ [end]
وَإِنَّكَ [And indeed, you] لَعَلَىٰ [surely (are)] خُلُقٍ [(of) a moral character] عَظِيمٍۢ [great]
فَسَتُبْصِرُ [So you will see] وَيُبْصِرُونَ [and they will see]
بِأَييِّكُمُ [Which of you] ٱلْمَفْتُونُ [(is) the afflicted one]

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] هُوَ [He] أَعْلَمُ [(is) most knowing] بِمَن [of (he) who] ضَلَّ [has strayed] عَن [from] سَبِيلِهِۦ [His way] وَهُوَ [and He] أَعْلَمُ [(is) most knowing] بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ [of the guided ones]
data.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dallaAAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bilmuhtadeen

data.wordByWord: وَدُّوا۟ [They wish] لَوْ [that] تُدْهِنُ [you should compromise] فَيُدْهِنُونَ [so they would compromise]
وَلَا [And (do) not] تُطِعْ [obey] كُلَّ [every] حَلَّافٍۢ [habitual swearer] مَّهِينٍ [worthless]
هَمَّازٍۢ [Defamer] مَّشَّآءٍۭ [going about] بِنَمِيمٍۢ [with malicious gossip]
مَّنَّاعٍۢ [A preventer] لِّلْخَيْرِ [of (the) good] مُعْتَدٍ [transgressor] أَثِيمٍ [sinful]
عُتُلٍّۭ [Cruel] بَعْدَ [after] ذَٰلِكَ [(all) that] زَنِيمٍ [utterly useless]
أَن [Because] كَانَ [(he) is] ذَا [a possessor] مَالٍۢ [(of) wealth] وَبَنِينَ [and children]

data.textUthmani: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِذَا [When] تُتْلَىٰ [are recited] عَلَيْهِ [to him] ءَايَـٰتُنَا [Our Verses] قَالَ [he says] أَسَـٰطِيرُ [Stories] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the former (people)]
data.transliteration: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatunaqala asateeru al-awwaleen
